## Hints.PuzzleSessionHints.getHintsForCell() method

Gets hints that specifically affect a given cell.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getHintsForCell(spec: string | IRowColumn | ICell, options?: IHintGenerationOptions): Result<readonly IHint[]>;
```
